item.title: CF 1395E(集合哈希)
item.description: 题目链接 https://codeforces.com/contest/1492/problem/E 题意 给定一个 directed and weighted graph，$2 \leq n \leq 2\cdot10^5, 2 \leq m \leq \min(2\cdot10^5, n(n-1))$，每个vertex的 out-degree 最多为 $1\leq k \leq 9$，每个edge的weig
